placeholder.overwriteExpire: (opt) the duration a manual setting will remain
placeholder.name: Name
placeholder.btnSort: sort all rules, Attention this can change the behavior!
placeholder.btnImport: Past rules from Clipboard to the list (append).
placeholder.ruleImportance: defined a importance how the rule should be work to overrides. Only Overrides with a higher or same importance can override the rule.
placeholder.ruleTopic: allows to define a seperate topic for outgoing message per rule, if not defined default topic will be used
placeholder.resetOverwrite: if checked manual overwrite will be reset when this rule becomes active the first time
placeholder.ruleTimeDays: select days wherefore it should be valid
placeholder.ruleTimeMonths: select months wherefore it should be valid
placeholder.autoTrigger: automatic triggers new calculation of the rule in a dynamic changing time interval
placeholder.startDelay2: delay any output to the first (or only) output on start (Node-Red start, Deplay, ...). Set to 0 to deactivate.
